A spy sent a top-secret order, RSA-signed with a risky low exponent. Recover their message from the intercepted transmission: 0xad1493b28762c9a5be697a16c61919ef990c8d24b2081434c7a5de61f267d052bfd4c1add08f0d891de549338e028d8a3f940e07538ea1a1a7e1260d3866180

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{eadxlqre}
ciphertext: 0xad1493b28762c9a5be697a16c61919ef990c8d24b2081434c7a5de61f267d052bfd4c1add08f0d891de549338e028d8a3f940e07538ea1a1a7e1260d3866180
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (4087198349540518595904300354888935413379613343546300979913335248084900680392600376765282125980843022355914795945696362062856523955423505216991642053566097, 3)
